OK it needs to float like a canoe or a tube. what a bout a surf board or wake board? thay float and would be scale. Surf board would be cool, but a wake board needs a boat and hot babes in bikinis. Parker parker parker.Thnks for the invite been a long time since I had a controller in my hand.lookin forward to my first g6 looks like a lot of fun .see you Friday night.:mrgreen:8) Anytime, Poochie has got a new motor and will be ready to podium or find the trailor. ATTENTION ALL G6 Drivers Follow the short cut to post #1, then copy and paste the questions below the G6 Joker's Wild flier in your reply. Answer the questions correctly and you may or may not be suprised during the Joker's Wild drivers meeting. http://www.rccrawler.com/forum/showpost.php?p=3180268&postcount=1 Good Luck and we are all a week and a wake up away from getting our scaler fix in a RECON G6! so this is what I have. will bring them up I know dan and see65 wanted one each, 10 bucks each ?going up friday after work doing some camping..see you guys up there I'll take a red one,if you have one left. 1.9 G-Rides Name / screen name / G-Ride / Shirt size 1.
